name: survey-backend
description: Node.js Rest Apis with Express, Sequelize & MySQL

scripts.bundle: mkdir deploy && cp -r app/config app/controllers app/models app/routes server.js package.json package-lock.json survey-backend.service deploy && rm deploy/config/dbConfig.js && mv deploy/config/prod.db.config.js deploy/config/dbConfig.js
